item.title: Bob Marley - Guava Jelly - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Guava Jelly by Bob Marley from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Bob Marley - I Shot The Sheriff - Key of Gm - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song I Shot The Sheriff by Bob Marley from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Cm7, Dm7, Gm.

item.title: Ka’au Crater Boys - Tropical Hawaiian Day - Key of F - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Tropical Hawaiian Day by Ka’au Crater Boys from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: B♭, C7, F.

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Redemption Song - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Redemption Song by Bob Marley & The Wailers from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Mad Caddies - She - Key of F# - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song She by Mad Caddies from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: B, C♯, F♯.

item.title: Bob Marley - Three Little Birds - Key of C - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Three Little Birds by Bob Marley from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: C, F, G.
